products.name: Bamboo Water Bottle
products.description: Eco-friendly bamboo water bottle with stainless steel interior. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. Perfect for daily hydration while reducing plastic waste.

products.name: Organic Cotton Tote Bag
products.description: Durable organic cotton tote bag perfect for grocery shopping or daily use. Machine washable and designed to last for years, replacing hundreds of plastic bags.

products.name: Recycled Paper Notebook
products.description: 100% recycled paper notebook with eco-friendly binding. Features 200 pages of smooth writing paper perfect for notes, journaling, or sketching.

products.name: Bamboo Kitchen Utensil Set
products.description: Complete bamboo kitchen utensil set including spoon, fork, knife, chopsticks, and straw. Comes with a travel pouch for on-the-go meals.

products.name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Double-walled stainless steel water bottle with vacuum insulation. BPA-free and designed to keep beverages at the perfect temperature all day long.

products.name: Hemp Messenger Bag
products.description: Stylish and durable hemp messenger bag perfect for work or school. Features multiple compartments and adjustable strap. Naturally antimicrobial and water-resistant.

products.name: Eco-friendly Ballpoint Pens
products.description: Set of 5 biodegradable ballpoint pens made from recycled materials. Smooth writing and perfect for everyday use.

products.name: Coconut Fiber Scrub Pads
products.description: Pack of 6 natural coconut fiber scrub pads for non-toxic dishwashing. Fully compostable and plastic-free.

products.name: Glass Reusable Coffee Cup
products.description: Durable reusable glass coffee cup with silicone grip and lid. Perfect eco-friendly alternative to disposable cups.

products.name: Jute Sling Bag
products.description: Trendy jute sling bag with adjustable strap. Lightweight, durable, and perfect for casual outings.

products.name: Eco-friendly Lunch Bag
products.description: Insulated eco-friendly lunch bag made with natural fabrics. Keeps food fresh while being lightweight and reusable, perfect for school, office, or travel.

products.name: Bamboo Desk Organizer
products.description: Eco-friendly bamboo desk organizer with compartments for pens, notes, and accessories. Perfect for keeping your workspace neat and sustainable.
